column1: Little Goat Diner////*Only Bongo Room can compete
column2: but I think this is the best brunch item of mi vidaaaaaaaaa! My friend (who is a svelte 6'4" and can eat for three) got a bowl of fries (fine
column4: a pulled pork bbq sandwich (YES. Not v brunchy in my book
column6: and a Fat Elvis (too sweet for me to want a whole one
